name: Salmon & Garnet Mandala with Gold Lotus Flower
description:
Celebrated by many cultures around the world, the Mandala, or "circle" symbolizes good luck, protection, prosperity, good health, and happiness. When mandalas are complete, or in a united circle, it enhances the natural and universal flow of our individual selves and our surrounding environments.

This important connection, that lives between us, and everything  all around us (from a bird's eye view), symbolizes the amazing power and state of our vibrations, frequencies and interconnectedness. 

Each of these 100% silk dyed Mandala bracelets is 35-40 cm long, unique in colors, come with an assortment of hand wrapped semi-precious stones, lava, Stirling silver and 14K gold plated charms. Each one is hand made with love and good intentions.

name: Winter Wonderland
description:
The Holiday season is about family, gratitude, love and togetherness. We were inspired by the colors and qualities of shells that we made a collection based on these beautiful "water jewels". 

Freshwater shells, rivershells and pearls are jewels made my Mother Nature using the ocean and rivers, not only to show us beauty, but to be mindful, present and to go with the "flow". 

Shell provides boundless growth. It stimulates Intuition, sensitivity, imagination & adaptability.  It helps to enhance mental clarity and provides insight into decision-making.  Shell promotes cooperation between the self and others, as well as within the self.  It provides cohesive energy for groups. The Hawaiians believed the mind, body and soul of a person were all interlinked and the physical body could not be healed without healing the spirit of the person. One of the healing methods they used was a seashell, by placing them on the person to restore spiritual and physical health. 

Pearls are closely connected to the moon and ocean, tides and transformation, love and beauty. They represent purity of the soul, faith, truth and wisdom.  Pearls symbolize transformation because they start as sources of discomfort that are transformed into objects of great beauty and illumination. They are also associated with ocean tides and the cycles of the moon, both of which undergo drastic change with grace, power and breathtaking beauty. 

This beautiful bracelet has Snow Quartz, Yellow Rivershell, Glass and Lava.

Snow Quartz brings calming and purification. Glass enhances positive transformation, rebirth, focus and communication and Lava is a stone of courage and strength. 

Every bracelet in the Holiday Collection comes with a small vial of Holiday Joy Blend Oil.

name: Agate, Jasper, Howlite Trio
description:
Fire Crackled Agate, Fancy Jasper, Howlite and Lava Mala Stacker. 

Part of our Elements collection, these bracelets represent the one to five of the essential elements of our mother earth. We pay respect and love to everything our mother earth gives us through using it's beauty in our jewelry.

Need more physical and emotional balancing? Then this beautiful agate and lava strand is for you. Known as a powerful and universal body balancer, crackled agate is believed to evoke mental and physiological wellness. Howlite is a wonderful grounding stone and Jasper is a physical, emotional and intellectual balancer!

name: Happiness and Independence Flow
description:
This gorgeous memory wire strand is made of Bronzite, Carnelian, and lava for optimum self respect, happiness, resourcefulness, and appetite for life. 

Oranges and some browns are the main colors for the sacral or lower abdomen energy space. Balanced and well attended to sacral energy flow promotes a happy, social, independent and a grounded person.

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. Using crystals and stones to help with energy flow has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual self as well as promotes positive energy flow from the inner through the outer self.

name: Self Worth and Ego Flow
description:
These beautiful strands relate to the solar plexus energy area. Made with Tiger's Eye, citrine and brown lava, the solar plexus guards and controls the self esteem, self worth, wisdom and clarity attributes of a person. 

Yellow is the main color for solar plexus energy space (below the ribs). How we feel about ourselves and how we feel others perceive us. This is the area of the personality, ego and intellect.  This is where interests and curiosities are stimulated and how we perceive and understand situations. 

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. Using crystals and stones to help with energy flow has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual self as well as promotes positive energy flow from the inner through the outer self.

options.name: Double Memory wire strand with Tree of Life Charm
Single Tiger's Eye and Citrine Strand
Double wire strand and single bracelet as a stacker

name: Exceptional Loving Flow
description:
This special memory wire strand is made of Malachite, Labradorite, Morganite, Rose Quartz, Moon Stone as well as Green Aventurine and Lava.

Green and pink are the the dominate colors for the Heart energy area, where balance, love, self control and understanding lives. The Green color, especially, helps relax muscles, nerves and thoughts and connects us to unconditional love.

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. Using crystals and stones to help with energy flow has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual self as well as promotes positive energy flow from the inner through the outer self.

name: Wholeness Energy Flow
description:
This Fancy Jasper memory wrap wire strand has colors ranging from red to brown, orange, yellow, green to yellow. 

Fancy Jasper intensifies and lightens the feeling of well-being, helping one to lighten up and enjoy themselves more. Jasper is powerful in its documented ability to relieve stress, anxiety, frustration and guilt, building an inner strength and confidence.  It is a particularly good stone for bringing energies of wholeness and healing to an environment or situation.

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. Using crystals and stones to help with energy flow has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual self as well as promotes positive energy flow from the inner through the outer self.

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. Using crystals and stones to help with energy flow has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual self as well as promotes positive energy flow from the inner through the outer self.

name: Emotional Wellness and Mental Flow
description:
These stackers are handmade with Rose quartz, Angelite, Amethyst, Agate, Ruby Quartz, Lava, Rhodonite and Morganite stones for better emotional support and mental flow.

Green and pink are the the dominate colors for the Heart energy area, where balance, love, self control and understanding lives. The heart energy space, when nurtured, helps us to relax our muscles, nerves and thoughts better and connects us to unconditional love.

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. Using crystals and stones to help with energy flow has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual self as well as promotes positive energy flow from the inner through the outer self.

Double Rose Quartz and Agate Strand
Double Angelite and Rose Quartz strand

name: Better Grounding and Base Flow
description:
These beautiful strands are made of Red jasper, hematite, ruby garnet and lava for grounding, pelvic health, and root wellness.

Red is the main color for the base (of spine) or root energy area. It is related to fertility, grounding, vitality, courage and self confidence. 

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. Using crystals and stones to help with energy flow has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual self as well as promotes positive energy flow from the inner through the outer self.

options.name: Bottom strand only (strand with more red jasper)
Top strand only (strand with more hematite)

name: Fancy Energy Flow
description:
Fancy, Red and Imperial Jasper with Amonzonite and Lava for better whole body physical, emotional and mental flow.

This stunning and colorful bracelet is made to reflect all 7 of the body's energy flow or chakras, which has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual and total energy of the inner and outer self.

Enjoy this bracelet with or without a Stirling silver or gold charm. Wear with your favorite essential oil and see how much better your energy lifts (and grounds) you!

name: Flow of Positive Communication
description:
These bracelet strands showcase Lapis Lazuli, Angelite, hematite, Swarovski crystals and lava for stronger will power, and confidence. (All strands can be purchased separately).

Blue is the dominate color of the Throat energy area where speech, ability to communicate and knowledge is expressed. Blue gives the ability to better convey our thoughts.
Swarovski crystals invite positive light and good energy while the hematite and promotes grounding and has been researched to increase blood flow and better liver functioning. Lava is a protector and grounder as well. 

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. Using crystals and stones to help with energy flow has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual self as well as promotes positive energy flow from the inner through the outer self.

Bottom Strand only (Angelite, Imperial jasper, Swarovski Crystals and Lava)

description:
Simple yet elegant, this Labradorite, Amethyst, Lava and White Quartz strand promotes better mental clarity and creativity flow. Shown with Lotus Flower charm.

Violet (represented by the Amethyst) and Labradorite stone are wonderful for stimulating inspiration, creativity and helping people find beauty and the "bigger" picture. Violet, in particular, powers up the inner strength and gives us the wisdom and guidance to undertake obstacles or daunting tasks.  

As part of the Energy Flow Collection, each of these stunning and colorful bracelets are made to reflect at least one of the seven energy flow or chakra centers of the body. name: Full Energy Flow
description:
This stunning and colorful bracelet is made to reflect all 7 of the body's energy flow or chakras, which has been used for thousands of years around the world as one of the best ways to help the wearer ground and balance the physical, emotional, intellectual and total energy of the inner and outer self. 

This bracelet is handmade of Hematite, Red Garnet or Red Jasper, Carnelian, Morganite, Tiger's Eye, Citrine, Jade, Angelite, Lapis Lazul, Amethyst and Lava.

Enjoy this bracelet with or without a Stirling silver or gold charm. Wear with your favorite essential oil and see how much better your energy lifts (and grounds) you!

The Aqua Terra Jasper eases worry, anxiety and fear, while the grounding lotus seed and lava rocks ward off negativity.

description:

Amber has been researched to alleviate pain, help with blood and body circulation and improve mental clarity. Carnelian stone is grounding and the agate is a superb body balancer and protector, as is the Lava stone. This bracelet is ideal for people who suffer from inflammatory diseases or auto-immune disorders that cause pain in muscles, joints and bones.

name: Freshwater River Shells, Crackled Agate, Carnelian Stacker
description:
Part of our Elements collection, these bracelets represent the one to five of the essential elements of our mother earth. We pay respect and love to everything our mother earth gives us through using it's beauty in our jewelry.

As part of the earth elements, this very attractive stacker showcases yellow river shells, cracked agate, carnelian and lava stone.

 River shells enhance mental clarity, as well as promotes intuition, sensitivity, imagination and adaptability. Agates are a great mood balancer and stabilizer. Carnelian is known for its grounding properties and lava is protecting, grounding and balancing altogether! 

Add a jasper stacker--great for stimulating root and base energy flow (sexual desires and fertility), and a protective stone-- for a more brilliant stacker!

description:
Part of our Elements collection, these bracelets represent the one to five of the essential elements of our mother earth. We pay respect and love to everything our mother earth gives us through using it's beauty in our jewelry.

This bracelet incorporates all of the earth elements. From the air (breath) used with the essential oils to the lava stone from the molten Earth's core, to the freshwater river shells and copper leaves (optimism and growth), it is a very encompassing piece. Serpentine stones are known for their great mood balancers and ability to solve relationship conflicts. River shells enhance mental clarity, as well as promotes intuition, sensitivity, imagination and adaptability. 

Enjoy with your favorite oils!

name: Purple Agate and Topaz Stacker
description:
Agates are great when trying to overcome fear and improve self expression. It is used in helping resolve family disputes as well as relationship building. Research also supports agates in the use of bone healing and thyroid and lymphatic system functioning.  

This beautiful stacker shines brilliantly in the light, as the topaz crystals attracts the positive energy in. Lava is grounding and protecting as well. A very attractive and purposeful piece.

name: Freshwater Pearl and Tigereye
description:
Part of our Elements collection, these bracelets represent the one to five of the essential elements of our mother earth. We pay respect and love to everything our mother earth gives us through using it's beauty in our jewelry.


The pearl helps in the search for higher wisdom and truth. It will absorb negative energy from anyone who wears it, then help that person to see and deal with the truth of self. These Moon and Water ruled "gems" enhance sincerely, truth and loyalty. They bring centering and a calming reflection, as well as attune the wearer to the ebb and flow of life. They are told to give purity, promote faith, charity and integrity, especially personal integrity. Due to its watery and lunar elements, it is quite balancing for the emotions.

With its vibrant golden color, tiger-eye is used to increase wealth and vitality. It enhances courage, brings passion and physical strength, and allows these attributes to be tempered with mental clarity and a joyful outlook. Ruled by the sun and possessing a golden flash of light, this stone is worn to strengthen convictions and create courage and confidence. It is a warm stone, and it promotes energy flow through the body when worn.

name: Be Positive
description:
Part of our "Be" Collection. Each bracelet is named after a way of being that is powerful to family, community and humanity. If we could each focus on "being" love, compassion, truth, gratitude, etc., we could change the world and end human suffering individually and globally.

Any bracelet in this "positive" collection can be worn individually or stacked. They consist of brecciated jasper, dragon vein agate, snow quartz, lava, Tibetan agate, red agate, and obsidian. 

Brecciated Jasper has the qualities of enhancing organization abilities, relaxation and acquiring a sense of wholeness. It brings happiness and a good outlook on life as it eases stress. It is an excellent stone for grounding oneself, as well it is a stone of protection.

Dragon vein agate can heighten creative visualization. It strengthens the ability and will to manifest one’s life purpose on the earth plane. Promotes energy and strength, and will help one discover the truth in a matter.Red Agate is the symbol of happiness and wealth

Snow Quartz is believed to help promote mental clarity. It is also said to provide support while you are learning lessons and to help you to let go of overwhelming responsibilities and limitations.

Black Obsidian is a very protective stone. It is said to form a shield against negativity and to absorb negative energies from the environment.

This bracelet is a powerful combination of agate and lava.

Agate is said to enhance one's perceptiveness and to stimulate analytical capacity, and to provide balance between one's physical, emotional, intellectual and spiritual states. Agate is also said to alleviate hostilities and promote goodwill. 
Agate is believed to help discern truth, accept circumstances, and is a powerful emotional healer. Legend says that Agate improves memory and concentration, increases stamina and encourages honesty.

Basalt (lava) is a stone of strength and courage, it allows one the opportunity for stability throughout changes in their life. If you are going through a lot of shifts in your life then basalt would be a helpful stone for you. Basalt helps to diminish the negative aspects of one’s character and allow us one to see where modification of your character can be helpful.

Gold-Sheen Obsidian is said to form a shield against negativity and to absorb negative energies from the environment. Gold-Sheen Obsidian can eliminate feelings of futility and ego-conflict allowing you to find your correct spiritual path. Its energy enhances your ability to achieve worldly success through the expression of your unique talents. Like all Obsidians, it is a powerful protection stone.

Basalt (lava) is a stone of strength and courage, it allows one the opportunity for stability throughout changes in their life. Basalt helps to diminish the negative aspects of one’s character and allow us one to see where modification of your character can be helpful.

name: Nicoya Love
description:
Part of the Global Collection. These bracelets are named after each of the five Blue Zones in the world. A Blue Zone is a region of the world where people commonly live active lives past the age of 100 years. Scientists and demographers have classified these longevity hot-spots by having common healthy traits and life practices that result in higher-than-normal longevity.

This bracelet was named after Nicoya, Costa Rica. It's an isolated region, accessible only by ferry until 2003, when the Taiwan Friendship bridge was constructed. A Costa Rican man at age 60 has about twice the chance of reaching age 90 as does a man living in the United States, France, or even Japan.

Nicoyan centenarians feel needed through fostering a plan de vida, or reason to live. This sense of purpose often centers around spending time with and providing for their family. This often results in centenarians retaining an active lifestyle, reaping the benefits of physical activity and exposure to the sun. Faith plays a strong role in the Nicoyan lifestyle. Relinquishing control of their life to God helps relieves stress and anxiety related to well-being.

This bracelet has the powerful lava (basalt) rock which amplifies inner strength, power and the healing properties of the oils. Four Tibetan agate focus beads for balance and rose quartz for peace and love.

Scientists and demographers have classified these longevity hot-spots by having common healthy traits and life practices that result in higher-than-normal longevity.

Perhaps where people live the longest in the world, Okinawa Islands of Japan holds tradition and truly joyous people. This beautiful bracelet will enhance creativity, strength, good luck and power for the wearer. It is made using 8mm fire etched agates and four focus 10mm brown tortoise agates.
